to spit/to send out (silk from a silkworm, bolls from cotton flowers etc)/to say/to pour out (one's grievances)
to vomit/to throw up
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)

foreign (non-Chinese)/barbarian/classifier for occurrences (of an event, action or speech utterance)/classifier for iterations: times, -fold (as in twofold etc)/classifier for situations: kind, sort

the Turpan Depression in Xinjiang

sentences.english: Strain XJ96077 was isolated from root nodules of alfalfa (Medicago sativa)from Xinjiang Reigon.
sentences.chinese: XJ96077菌株分离自新疆吐鲁番的苜蓿根瘤中。

sentences.english: The ancient books and articles in the tombs unearthed in Turpan have proved this historical fact.
sentences.chinese: 吐鲁番出土的文书和随葬品充分证明了这一历史史实。

sentences.english: Not far from Truvan is a Flaming Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 离吐鲁番不远有一座火焰山。

sentences.english: Documents from Turfan and Dunhuang shared similar fate in modern history of China.
sentences.chinese: 吐鲁番和敦煌文献在近代史上拥有相似的历史经历。

sentences.english: GPU Soviet troops did not advance beyond Turfan.
sentences.chinese: 苏联军队未能提前越过吐鲁番。

sentences.english: But it isn't as hot as Turpan in summer because it's in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 但它夏天不像吐鲁番那么热因为它在山脉里面。

sentences.english: After 36 hours he had to Turpan.
sentences.chinese: 经过36小时他到了吐鲁番。

sentences.english: The Turpan grapes, Hami melons and Ili apples are all the best.
sentences.chinese: 吐鲁番的葡萄，哈密的瓜，伊犁的苹果顶呱呱。

sentences.english: In the town of Turpan, grapes could be seen everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 在吐鲁番镇，葡萄随处可见。

sentences.english: Not far from Turfan lies the 'Flaming Mountain'.
sentences.chinese: 离吐鲁番不远有一座火焰山。

sentences.english: That's pretty cheap for I know the railway station in Turpan is far away from the center of the city.
sentences.chinese: 我知道吐鲁番车站离市中心远着呢，这价钱够便宜。
